main event: A family reported observing a UFO consisting of multiple lights while driving in Sommerville, Ohio on November 13, 1968.
interesting points: The observers noted that the lights seemed to follow their car while they were driving,There were five distinct lights observed in the sky,The family felt a strange sensation that the lights wanted to communicate with them,The object was described as having blinking lights and seeming to change in size,There was a hand-drawn map included in the report depicting the general area of the sighting.
witness description: The witness was a 55-year-old female named Evelyn Sommerville, along with her husband and two daughters.
